resources.string: It is free and takes a minute. It allows you to save progress..!
Enough for you to walk around the bedroom, and to keep your feet warm, but not much else.
You can go out of the bedroom and take a walk. But you can go only as far as your feet can take you,and it is not too far!
Shoes and running are all good, but a bicycle will get you places faster and farther! But, you dont get to save the world
Mastered the bicycle. Proceed to the scooter. But whoever saved the world on scooter ?
Scooters are all good, but if you want to get there faster, and be seen as cooler (adjective) nothing walks the talk like a motorcycle does.
If you really want to be Bruce Wayne, you need more than just a bike to fit all those beauties into. A supercar is definitely de rigueur.
Superman, Batman, or James Bond, what\'s a super hero without a proper suit? It is the ultimate mark of every superhero. Suit up!
Wondering who made the app possible? Here is who
You can edit your profile here!
Psst.. By clicking signup, you are agreeing to our privacy policy
This will reset all the settings to zero.All your progress will be lost.Use this only if you are certain about what you are doing!
We will be said to see you leave.Are you sure you can\'t stay a while longer?
You\'ve just missed the gold medal and a full star!
You\'ve just missed the silver medal and a star!
You are a star! and You\'ve got one!
Take a quiz and earn a star!
< made with love by team Pi of x >
As counting animals, vagueness and uncertainity in prime numbers surprises us. The gravity of this strange unpredictability kept bringing down scintistists and mathematicians.

The prime counting function was the tool that allowed them to reach escape velocity. To make sense of the infinite randomness of primes.At Pi of x, we wish to help you do the same - make sense of the randomness that is exam prep
